name: Baryta iodata
relationship: Compare: Acon. lycoctonum (swelling of cervical, axillary, and mammary glands). Lapis; Con. Merc. iod.; Carbo an.
details: Acts on the lymphatic system, INCREASED LEUCOCYTOSIS. QUINSY. INDURATED GLANDS, ESPECIALLY TONSILS AND BREASTS. Strumous ophthalmia, with tumefaction of cervical glands and stunted growth. Tumors.
